about_the_game:
A relaxing logic game about creating your own Japanese-style garden configurations. Through block play and decoration, you can solve 60 handcrafted puzzles with multiple solutions and enjoy it as a form of meditation, much like Japanese Zen monks watching the result of your imagination.

Features

Organize Your Own Gardens.

Relaxing Game Without Timers, Meters, Or Scores.

Explore different settings and objects you can interact with.
Discover the evolution of a character through the lessons learned with each puzzle.
